sentence: You don’t want to have to talk about anything political.” According to Kathy Foulkrod, a friend told her, “I just came to tell you I had to take my Biden sign down because I was too afraid.” The Democrats Politico interviewed in Clearfield County, Cadelago reports, “say party leaders need to come to terms with just how calamitous the dropoff of rural support has been.” Cadelago writes, “The fundamental question the party needs to answer — one that gnaws at everyone from the Foulkrods and Fitzpatrick to Biden’s advisers in Washington — is: how far can they expect to get with people who refuse even to listen?”
